Description.Name: Jane Maya
Description.Details: Hailing from a prestigious lineage Jane Maya chose to defy societal expectations and carve her own path as a MechWarrior. As her callsign suggests "Dragonfly" is an aerial expert with exceptional piloting skills, she gracefully navigates her Mech through the chaos of combat. Despite her privileged background, she is admired by her peers for her humility and sense of justice.
